description: Structured information on a used parameter set.
label: Parameter set
name: ParameterSet

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte._instruction: Enter the common context for the parameters grouped in this set.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/param._instruction: Add all numerical and string parameters that belong to this parameter set.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/param.description: Digital or physical property determining a particular function, characteristic or behavior of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/param.label: Parameter
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/param.name: parameter

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relev._instruction: Add the technique or behavioral task where this set of parameters is used in.
